duties_responsibilities.duty: Leads all aspects of the company’s safety culture and creates awareness by demonstrating commitment to an injury-free environment through individual actions and mentoring others.
Manages and oversees company staff, subcontractors, suppliers and programs such as Safety, Quality and EEOC for a small project or a major portion of a larger project.
Coordinates and manages the care, custody and control of the project site.
Creates, manages, changes, and implements the project’s schedule as needed, in conjunction with the Project Manager.
Manages timecard approval process to ensure reporting of accurate hours and proper cost codes.
Understands and applies the terms and conditions of the owner and subcontractor contracts for the project.
Responsible for identifying and recruiting top talent.
Understands JE Dunn’s policy of non-discrimination and ensures positive, proactive implementation throughout the organization.
Manages the largest, most complex stand-alone and/or multiple complex projects from initial planning to completion.
Provides input, leads and executes company and regional key strategic initiatives.
Manages budgets, maximizes profitability, and generates future work through building relationships.
Effectively delivers leadership messages to multiple audiences both internally and externally.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in construction management, engineering, or related field (Preferred). In lieu of the above requirements, equivalent relevant experience will be considered.
